entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
